title: Which is the first Indian song that hit 1 billion views on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some people are adding rhymes and everything but Chi Chu TV has rhymes with over 1B Hanuman chalisa is a bhajan /devotional song which is played by many people Whereas laung laachi is punjabi song which (not national language) and is a song reaching 1B So it's laung laachi
Basically the first song was hanuman chalisa But in people's mind laung lachi Punjabi song was first song to cross 1 billion view
